sentences: Meie lapsed ei kutsu alati vanemaid ööseks.
Kas te saaksid mind kutsuda homme?
context: The word 'kutsuge' is the plural form of the Estonian verb 'kutsuma', which means to invite, call or summon. It specifically refers to the 3rd person plural imperative form (command/request). The root verb can mean inviting someone to an event, calling out to someone, or formally summoning them.
